welcome_back: Welcome back! Please sign in to continue
password_required: Password must be at least 6 characters
forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
password_reset_sent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
tap_to_add_device: Tap the + button to add your first device
invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
general_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
delete_device_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this device?
power_positive: Power must be a positive number
hours_positive: Usage hours must be a positive number
no_manufacturers: No manufacturers found for this category
logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
delete_account_confirmation: This will permanently delete your account and data. Are you sure?
clear_cache_confirmation: Are you sure you want to clear all cached data?
real_time_sync_description: Enable to get live updates on energy consumption.
energy_unit_apply_note: Changes will apply throughout the app
currency_apply_note: Changes will apply throughout the app
notifications_description: Get alerts for high consumption or daily summaries.
add_devices_prompt: Add devices to start tracking your energy consumption
db_migration_failed: Database optimization failed. Please try again.
optimize_database_description: Improve app performance by optimizing your data storage.
detailed_view_hint: Tap to see detailed hourly consumption
evening_peak_tip: Your energy usage peaks in the evening. Try using major appliances earlier in the day to reduce peak consumption.
morning_peak_tip: Your energy usage peaks in the morning. Consider staggering your use of appliances to reduce peak consumption.
midday_peak_tip: Your energy usage peaks at midday. Try using natural light instead of artificial lighting when possible.
general_energy_tip: For maximum energy efficiency, unplug appliances when not in use and use smart power strips for electronics.
refrigerator_tip: Your refrigerator is consuming a significant amount of energy. Try setting the temperature to 37-40째F (3-4째C) for the fridge and 0-5째F (-18 to -15째C) for the freezer for optimal efficiency.
ac_tip: Your air conditioner is your highest energy consumer. Raise the temperature by 1-2 degrees to save up to 10% on cooling costs, and consider using a programmable thermostat.
washer_tip: To reduce your washing machine's energy use, wash with cold water when possible and run full loads. Consider air-drying clothes instead of using a dryer.
tv_tip: Your TV and entertainment devices use significant power. Use power-saving modes, reduce brightness, and turn them off completely (not standby) when not in use.
lighting_tip: Switch to LED bulbs to reduce lighting energy use by up to 75%. Turn off lights when not needed and use natural light during daytime.
